Welcome!

On this page you can upload a PDF, which you can query through Vectorsearch.
To upload a PDF, make a new Namespace, which will represent your file, and then upload your PDF!.
To query that PDF, go to the menu points VectorSearch or VectorSearch with LLM, and select your namespace
of choice to query in the menu bar.
Merry Querying!
